div.p: This query provides a view of all place data in the SanteDB system
Filter by the name of the place
The uppermost place in the hierarchy to begin the reporting for

npgsql FirebirdSQL
WITH RECURSIVE PARENT_RELATIONS(CHILD_ID, PARENT_ID, PARENT_NAME) AS ( -- ROOT NODES SELECT ENT_VRSN_TBL.ENT_ID CHILD_ID, NULL::UUID PARENT_ID, NULL::TEXT AS PARENT_NAME FROM ENT_VRSN_TBL INNER JOIN PLC_TBL USING (ENT_VRSN_ID) INNER JOIN ENT_NAME_TBL ON (ENT_VRSN_TBL.ENT_ID = ENT_NAME_TBL.ENT_ID AND ENT_NAME_TBL.USE_CD_ID = '1ec9583a-b019-4baa-b856-b99caf368656' AND ent_name_tbl.OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL) INNER JOIN ENT_NAME_CMP_TBL ON (ENT_NAME_TBL.NAME_ID = ENT_NAME_CMP_TBL.NAME_ID) WHERE CASE WHEN ${parent}::UUID IS NULL THEN ENT_VRSN_TBL.ENT_ID NOT IN (SELECT SRC_ENT_ID FROM ENT_REL_TBL WHERE REL_TYP_CD_ID = 'bfcbb345-86db-43ba-b47e-e7411276ac7c') ELSE ${parent}::UUID = ENT_VRSN_TBL.ENT_ID END AND HEAD UNION ALL SELECT SRC_ENT_ID CHILD_ID, TRG_ENT_ID PARENT_ID ,VAL AS PARENT_NAME FROM ENT_REL_TBL CROSS JOIN PARENT_RELATIONS INNER JOIN ENT_NAME_TBL ON (TRG_ENT_ID = ENT_NAME_TBL.ENT_ID AND ENT_NAME_TBL.USE_CD_ID = '1ec9583a-b019-4baa-b856-b99caf368656' AND ent_name_tbl.OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL) INNER JOIN ENT_NAME_CMP_TBL ON (ENT_NAME_TBL.NAME_ID = ENT_NAME_CMP_TBL.NAME_ID) WHERE REL_TYP_CD_ID = 'bfcbb345-86db-43ba-b47e-e7411276ac7c' AND ENT_REL_TBL.OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL AND PARENT_RELATIONS.CHILD_ID = TRG_ENT_ID ) SELECT ent_vrsn_tbl.ent_id, parent_relations.parent_id, parent_name, ent_name_cmp_tbl.val AS name, cls_cd.val AS class, typ_cd.val AS type, sts_cd.mnemonic AS status FROM ent_vrsn_tbl INNER JOIN PARENT_RELATIONS ON (ENT_VRSN_TBL.ENT_ID = PARENT_RELATIONS.CHILD_ID) INNER JOIN plc_tbl USING (ENT_VRSN_ID) INNER JOIN ent_name_tbl ON (ent_vrsn_tbl.ent_id = ent_name_tbl.ENT_ID AND ENT_NAME_TBL.USE_CD_ID = '1ec9583a-b019-4baa-b856-b99caf368656' AND ent_name_tbl.OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL) INNER JOIN ENT_NAME_CMP_TBL ON (ENT_NAME_TBL.NAME_ID = ENT_NAME_CMP_TBL.NAME_ID) INNER JOIN cd_name_tbl cls_cd ON (ent_vrsn_tbl.CLS_CD_ID = cls_cd.cd_id AND cls_cd.OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL) INNER JOIN cd_vrsn_tbl sts_cd ON (ent_vrsn_tbl.STS_CD_ID = sts_cd.cd_id AND sts_cd.HEAD) LEFT JOIN cd_name_tbl typ_cd ON (ent_vrsn_tbl.TYP_CD_ID = typ_cd.cd_id AND typ_cd.OBSLT_VRSN_SEQ_ID IS NULL) WHERE ent_vrsn_tbl.head AND CASE WHEN ${status}::UUID IS NULL THEN TRUE ELSE ent_vrsn_tbl.sts_cd_id = ${status}::UUID END AND CASE WHEN ${name}::TEXT IS NULL THEN TRUE ELSE ent_name_cmp_tbl.val ILIKE '%' || ${name}::TEXT || '%' END AND ent_vrsn_tbl.cls_cd_id IN (SELECT cd_id FROM cd_set_mem_assoc_tbl WHERE set_id = '3d02fb53-1133-406d-a06f-7d47a556f3bc') AND CASE WHEN ${class}::UUID IS NULL THEN TRUE ELSE ent_vrsn_tbl.cls_cd_id = ${class}::UUID END AND CASE WHEN ${type}::UUID IS NULL THEN TRUE ELSE ent_vrsn_tbl.typ_cd_id = ${type}::UUID END
